description.value:
Choose physical invigoration or mental invigoration, and add the listed conditions to those you can choose for an invigorating elixir you create to counteract:

Physical Invigoration @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Blinded], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Deafened], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Drained], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Paralyzed], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Slowed]

Mental Invigoration @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Confused], controlled, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Fleeing], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Frightened], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Paralyzed], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Slowed].

Special You can select this feat a second time to choose a different type of invigoration and add its options to those you can choose.
